pr_title: Fix join filter push down post-join virtual column handling

timeline.message: Fix join filter push down post-join virtual column handling
Remove unused adapter param, update javadocs

timeline.bodyText: missing unit tests for this in HashJoinSegmentStorageAdapterTest
timeline.author: suneet-s

timeline.bodyText: This is very similar to the code above in makeCursors(...) Perhaps move this into a utility function so they stay in sync. Or do you want this function to provide different functionality?
timeline.author: suneet-s

replies.bodyText: I initially wanted it to provide different functionality (where the non-testing version also adds virtual columns to the prejoin/postjoin lists), but I collapsed them into one method
replies.author: jon-wei

timeline.bodyText:
nit: public functions marked VisibleForTesting are hard to maintain, because people can accidentally call this function from another package and there's nothing that warns them they're doing something wrong.
I also noticed this function is only called in a test, can we refactor this so that we don't need a public VisibleForTesting function
timeline.author: suneet-s

replies.bodyText: I collapsed this into a shared method with the block in makeCursors and removed VisibleForTesting
replies.author: jon-wei

timeline.author: suneet-s
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -72,8 +72,21 @@
   private static final String PUSH_DOWN_VIRTUAL_COLUMN_NAME_BASE = "JOIN-FILTER-PUSHDOWN-VIRTUAL-COLUMN-";
   private static final ColumnSelectorFactory ALL_NULL_COLUMN_SELECTOR_FACTORY = new AllNullColumnSelectorFactory();
 
+  /**
+   * Analyze a filter and return a JoinFilterSplit indicating what parts of the filter should be applied pre-join
+   * and post-join.
+   *
+   * @param hashJoinSegmentStorageAdapter The storage adapter that is being queried
+   * @param baseColumnNames               Set of names of columns that belong to the base table,
+   *                                      including pre-join virtual columns
+   * @param originalFilter                Original filter from the query
+   * @param enableFilterPushDown          Whether to enable filter push down
+   * @return A JoinFilterSplit indicating what parts of the filter should be applied pre-join
+   *         and post-join.
+   */

timeline.bodyText: what happens if one of the required columns is a virtual column?
timeline.author: suneet-s

replies.bodyText: Virtual columns currently can't use other virtual columns as input (they're each constructed independently from the base columns), if you tried I think it would just operate as if you referenced a non-existent column
replies.author: jon-wei

timeline.author: suneet-s

timeline.message: Merge branch 'fix_join_virtcolumn' of github.com:jon-wei/druid into fix_join_virtcolumn
